div.p: Join us in Portland, Oregon fon Thursday-Saturday, October 24-26 in Portland, Oregon for the third (and first since 2019) edition of CascadiaPHP! We're excited to bring back a PHP conference run by and for the community to the Pacific Northwest. As with previous years, Portland State University's campus will be our venue.
Our CFP has been extended to Thursday, June 27th, and we'd love to see your talk and tutorial abstracts for PHP and PHP-adjacent topics. Submit to the CFP today!
